snippet: In one of the gambling industry’s most rancorous public feuds, Stephen A. Wynn and Kazuo Okada are accusing one another of making payments meant to curry favor from public officials.
abstract: Casino magnate Stephen A Wynn and Japanese billionaire Kazuo Okada are engaged in one of the most rancorous public feuds the international gambling industry has ever seen; founding partners of Wynn Resorts have accused one another of making illegal payments meant to curry favor from public officials in Macao, which accounts for nearly all of the company's profits; industry insiders worry that feud may bring unwanted investigations into the freewheeling and wildly lucrative Macao gambling industry.
lead_paragraph: In one of the gambling industry’s most rancorous public feuds, Stephen A. Wynn and Kazuo Okada are accusing one another of making payments meant to curry favor from public officials.

headline.seo: Wynn Resorts Partners Split, and Accusations Fly
headline.main: Builders of Casino Empire Split, and the Bitter Accusations Fly
headline.print_headline: Builders of Casino Empire Split, And the Bitter Accusations Fly
